Package DAO

Class DBAppointments

java.lang.Object
DAO.DBAppointments
public abstract class DBAppointments extends Object
The DBAppointments class provides database operations related to appointments.

    • getAppointmentsByMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentsByMonth(String selectedMonth) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of appointments for a specific month.
      Parameters:
      selectedMonth - The selected month (e.g., "JANUARY").
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of Appointment objects for the selected month.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.
